name: Tower of Maro
description:
CAGD 470 - Fall 2019

1 Player

Tower of Maro is a game about a famed Wizard named Maro, who was a hero amongst the land, until his tragic death years ago. After his death, they remained as a spirit in their tower, resting and relaxing, until the tower was invaded by an unknown evil force in order to use it as a dungeon. Now, Maro must take back their tower and defeat the evil within the Tower of Maro.

Tower of Maro is a top down shooter where you will need to use the correct spell on the correct enemy in order to defeat them faster. In this game you will need to understand the different elements and weaknesses of each enemy and you would also need to explore the map for health potions and the crystal that opens the boss door. 

System requirements (the requirements are most likely less powerful than these requirements)

  • CPU: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6300
  • RAM: 8 GB
  • OS: Windows 10
  • VIDEO CARD: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280
  • PIXEL SHADER: 5.0
  • VERTEX SHADER: 5.0
  • FREE DISK SPACE: 150 GB
  • DEDICATED VIDEO RAM: 2048 MB
